message.entry: Unable to find class ''{0}''.
Size inputs must be numeric.
Size inputs must be numeric. No class name, Like, or FillValue specified.
Specifying Like and class name not supported.
Specifying Like and FillValue not supported.
Specifying ClassName and FillValue not supported.
FillValue must be specified after class name.
Default constructor for class ''{0}'' does not return a scalar object.
Fill value must be scalar.
Unable to convert fill value to scalar instance of class ''{0}''.
Template value must be scalar because class is copyable.
Indexed assignment created {0} array instead of {1} array.
{0}.{1} created {2} array instead of {0} array.
{0}.{1} created a real array instead of a complex array.
{0}.{1} created a sparse array instead of a full array.
{0}.{1} created a full array instead of a sparse array.
{0}.{1} created {2} array instead of {3} array.
{0}.{1} created array with reference to prototype.
{0}.{1} created array with reference to fill value.
{0}.{1} created array with multiple references to the same object.
Cannot create array of {0} objects because {0} objects are not copyable.
Cannot create array of {0} objects because copyElement method returns reference to original object.
Class ''{0}'' not supported.
Array formation with objects of class ''{0}'' is not allowed. Use objects of class ''{0}'' only as scalars or use a cell array.
N-D sparse output arrays not supported.
Extracting first element of array changes class from ''{0}'' to ''{1}''.
Extracting first element of {0} array does not return scalar.
Cannot create array of {0} objects via ().
Indexed assignment for class ''{0}'' modifies the original object.

Unexpected error trying to call createArrayLike.
Unable to create array.
